title: Death Sworn Talon
body: *  i think it would look pretty badass thb {{champion:91}}                 {{champion:112}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:55}}

replies.body: Ooh that could be a neat thematic for him! I think it really suits a lot of the assassins, Death Sworn Akali and Death Sworn Diana come to mind as cool options ^^
i would sell my kidney to have Death Sworn Akali and DIana.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UY1TxJTF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-28T01:30:09.225+0000)
>
> Ooh that could be a neat thematic for him! I think it really suits a lot of the assassins, Death Sworn Akali and Death Sworn Diana come to mind as cool options ^^

Death Sworn Shaco{{champion:35}}  comes to mind tbh it sounds like a really fitting theme for him, what do u think? :)
or a rival shared theme like project between talon and quinn

Hey Riot if its cool with you can anyone at the skins team check this [**POST**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/UJGEOZT9-question-for-riot-hopefully-they-answer) out and write an answer to this?

I would strongly disagree if they are made like Kata. They need to actually be ethereal for the theme to work, as opposed to Kata, who still just looks like a repurposed Neon Strike since she is clearly alive.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UY1TxJTF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-28T01:30:09.225+0000)
>
> Ooh that could be a neat thematic for him! I think it really suits a lot of the assassins, Death Sworn Akali and Death Sworn Diana come to mind as cool options ^^

I have a few cool ideas for my boy.
1. project
2. dark star (imagine his rake and ult are like shooting stars)
3. night hunter, with the hood up/hood down mechanic to the skin

I kinda see a Death Sworn Talon. I swear there was a Soul Reaper Talon. Maybe I'm going crazy though.

I really would've liked a Death Sworn Taliyah. Kinda tired of her two existing skins being sweet and nice.

Death Sworn Brand would look like his Spirit Fire skin.
